episodes.title: Breaking: Media giant Global acquires Captivate
episodes.description:
In Podnews today: The growth-oriented podcast host is bought by Europe's biggest radio group. Plus, the other podcast host described as a 'scam'
     
Visit https://podnews.net/update/global-acquisition-captivate for all the podcasting news, and to get our daily newsletter.
episodes.author: james@crid.land (James Cridland)
